responses: Hi there, welcome to JIS Group, how can I help you?
See you later, thanks for visiting

patterns: Can you tell me about JIS Group?
Please tell me about your group
I do not know anything about JIS Group
Who is the owner of this group?
responses: JIS Group is born out of Sardar Jodh Singh's entrepreneurial vision, which through the years have spanned in the fields of the dairy business, telecommunication, transportation, infrastructure, logistics, education, healthcare, information technology, cargo, and social service. Please visit https://www.jisgroup.org/

patterns: Which courses are offered by your institutions?
responses: We offer Enginnering, Medical, and Healthcare courses

patterns: Which institutes fall under JIS Group?
responses: Guru Nanak Institute of Pharmaceutical Science & Technology,JIS College of Engineering,Narula Institute of Technology,Guru Nanak Institute of Technology,Guru Nanak Institute of Dental Science & Research,Guru Nanak Institute of Hotel Management,Head Office,JIS School Of Polytechnic,Dr. Sudhir Chandra Sur Institute of Technology & Sports Complex,JIS Institute Of Aviation,Greater Kolkata College of Engg. & Management,Asansol Engineering College,Abacus Institute of Engineering & Management,JIS University,Gargi Memorial Institute of Technology,JIS Institute of Skill Development-KOLKATA,Guru Nanak Technical Foundation (GTF),Guru Nanak Polytechnic Foundation (GPF),Narula Public School ( NPS),JIS Foundation,Narula Educational Trust ( NET),JIS Institute of Advanced Studies & Research - JIS University ,JIS INSTITUTE OF SKILL DEVELOPMENT - GUWAHATI,IIMSAR & Dr.BCRHH,JIS INSTITUTE OF SKILL DEVELOPMENT - JHARKHAND,JIS INSTITUTE OF SKILL DEVELOPMENT - BIHAR,HASH TECHNOLOGIES,Haldia Institute Of Dental Sciences & Research (HIDSAR),Sree Narayan Medical Institute & Hospital, Saharsa,GULZAR GROUP OF INSTITUTION ,JISMSR,GURU NANAK EDUCATION TRUST (GET),JIS INDUSTRIAL TRAINING PVT LTD,FLEMMING COLLEGE OF PHARMACY,RHODE ISLAND PUBLIC SCHOOL,LORD BUDDHA KOSHI MEDICAL COLLEGE & HOSPITAL,JIS INSTITUTE OF TRAFFIC MANAGEMENT

patterns: Is there any scope for scholarship? if yes, what is the criteria?
responses: Yes we do provide scholarship you will get the detailed info about it in the college website
